intro: Ribes gongshanense, commonly known as the Gongshan gooseberry, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the genus Ribes in the family Grossulariaceae, which includes other shrubs and small trees. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and produces small, aggregate fruits that are typically yellow or orange in color. It thrives in temperate climates and is often found in mountainous regions with well-drained soils. Due to its limited distribution, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
